snippet: Chris Huhne, the energy and climate chief, is accused of perverting the course of justice in a 2003 speeding case.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron's coalition is shaken when criminal charges for perverting the course of justice in an eight-year-old speeding case are laid against Chris Huhne, the minister of energy and climate change, and he resigns; Huhne denies wrongdoing and vows to mount a vigorous defense.
lead_paragraph: Chris Huhne, the energy and climate chief, is accused of perverting the course of justice in a 2003 speeding case.

headline.seo: Chris Huhne Resignation in Britain Shakes Cameron’s Coalition
headline.main: Departure of British Official Shakes Cameron’s Coalition
headline.print_headline: Departure of British Official Shakes Cameron’s Coalition
